name: Bus Parking 19: Careful Drivin
description:
Bus Parking 19: Careful Driving is new bus parking game with several challenging levels. By playing this bus driving game you have to test your bus driving skills and improve them to become parking master. For becoming a modern bus driver start your journey by driving the modern coach, includes several challenging levels by completing them you.
Features:
- High quality detailed graphics
- Awesome bus parking
- Lots of varied missions
- Smooth and easy steering controls
- Detailed bus Interiors with dash board view
- Day and night mode
- Realistic bus physics.
